casebody.data:
State of Connecticut v. Wilson Ortiz (8932)

Daly, Landau and Heiman, Js.

Argued May 28 decision released June 25, 1991 Thomas Ullmann, assistant public defender, for the appellant (defendant). Timothy J. Sugrue, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Michael Dearington, state’s attorney, and John Waddock, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
